cancelSession.title: Cancel Session: {name} ({branch})?
cancelSession.body: This will move the session to the archive.
cancelSession.warningUncommitted: Warning: This session has uncommitted changes that will be lost!
cancelSession.allCommitted: All changes in this session have been committed.

deleteSpec.title: Delete Spec: {name}?
deleteSpec.body: This will archive the spec prompt so you can recover it later from Settings â†’ Archives.
deleteSpec.bodyNote: You can permanently delete it from the archive if desired.

convertToSpec.title: Convert Session to Spec
convertToSpec.body: Convert {name} back to a spec agent?
convertToSpec.warningTitle: âš  Warning: Uncommitted changes will be lost
convertToSpec.warningBody: This session has uncommitted changes in the worktree. Converting to spec will:
convertToSpec.warningItem1: Remove the worktree and all uncommitted changes
convertToSpec.warningItem3: Preserve the agent description as a spec
convertToSpec.footnote: The agent content will be preserved and can be started again later.

discardFile.title: Discard File Changes
discardFile.body: This will discard all uncommitted changes for the file:

resetSession.title: Reset Session Worktree
resetSession.body: This will discard ALL uncommitted changes and reset this session branch to its base branch. This action cannot be undone.

theme.label: Theme
theme.moreThemes: More themes coming soon: Nord, and more.

appearance.fontFamilyPlaceholder: Examples: "JetBrains Mono, MesloLGS NF" or "Monaspace Neon"
appearance.fontFamilyDesc: Uses your system-installed fonts. Powerline/â‰¡ glyphs need a Nerd Font. A safe fallback chain is applied automatically.
appearance.gpuAccelerationDesc: Uses hardware acceleration for better performance with multiple terminals. Automatically falls back to the DOM renderer if WebGL is unavailable.
appearance.devDiagnosticsDesc: Surface popup toasts whenever frontend or backend errors occur while running Schaltwerk in development mode. Release builds ignore this toggle.
appearance.showErrorToasts: Show error toasts automatically during dev runs

archives.title: Archived Specs
archives.description: Recover deleted prompts back to specs.

terminal.title: Terminal Shell Configuration
terminal.shellPathPlaceholder: Leave empty to use system default ($SHELL)
terminal.shellArgsDesc: Space-separated arguments passed to the shell. Leave empty for default interactive mode.
terminal.shellNote: Note: Changes will apply to new terminals only. Existing terminals will continue using their current shell.
terminal.commandPrefixDesc: Prefix command for all agent executions.
terminal.remoteAccessDesc: Set prefix to vt to use VibeTunnel for browser-based remote terminal access
terminal.wrappersDesc: Use custom wrappers for logging, resource limiting, or environment setup

sessions.title: Session Review Settings
sessions.description: Configure how sessions are handled when marked as reviewed.
sessions.skipConfirmationDesc: Skip confirmation dialogs for actions that ask "Don't ask me again". When enabled, previously dismissed confirmations will be automatically applied.
sessions.alwaysShowLargeDiffsDesc: Always render large diffs instead of collapsing them by default. When disabled, diffs over 500 lines or 100KB will be collapsed for performance.
sessions.rememberIdleSessions: Remember idle sessions when I switch away

skipConfirmationInfoItems.applies: Applies to dialogs that have "Don't ask me again" options
skipConfirmationInfoItems.proceed: When enabled, actions will proceed without confirmation
skipConfirmationInfoItems.useful: Useful for experienced users who want faster workflow
skipConfirmationInfoItems.toggle: Can be toggled at any time to restore confirmation prompts

version.title: Application Information
version.autoUpdatesDesc: Keep Schaltwerk up to date by installing releases on startup.
version.manualCheckDesc: Fetch the latest release information from GitHub and install it immediately if available.

keyboard.pressNewShortcut: Press the new shortcut for {label} or press Escape to cancel.

projectGeneral.branchPrefixDesc: Configure the default Git branch prefix used when creating new Schaltwerk sessions. Leave empty to use session names directly as branch names. Use slashes to nest groups. Spaces will be converted to hyphens automatically.
projectGeneral.mergeDefaultsDesc: Control what happens after a successful merge from the sidebar. When enabled, Schaltwerk will immediately cancel the merged session for this project.
projectGeneral.mergeToggleNote: You can also toggle this from the merge dialog's toolbar. The preference is stored per project.

projectRun.worktreeSetupDesc: Configure a script that runs automatically when a new worktree is created for this project. The script will be executed in the new worktree directory.
projectRun.runScriptDesc: Configure the command executed by Run Mode (âŒ˜E). When it finishes or is killed, the run terminal becomes read-only and shows the exit status.
projectRun.commandPlaceholder: e.g., bun run dev or npm run dev
projectRun.previewLocalhostDesc: Intercept localhost links in terminals and open them in Preview.
projectRun.runScriptTip: Tip: Use a package manager script (for example, "bun run dev" or "npm run dev") or any shell command. The command runs in a dedicated read-only terminal and ends when the process exits.
projectRun.projectEnvVarsDesc: Configure environment variables that will be set for all agents in this project. These variables are applied to all terminals and agent processes.

projectActions.title: Action Buttons
projectActions.description: Configure custom action buttons that appear in the terminal header for both orchestrator and agent views. These buttons provide quick access to common AI prompts that will be pasted directly into Claude.

howItWorksItems.click: Click any action button to instantly paste its prompt into Claude
howItWorksItems.keyboard: Use keyboard shortcuts F1-F6 for even faster access
howItWorksItems.buttons: Buttons appear next to "Agent" and "Reset" in the terminal header

projectActions.label: Label
projectActions.promptPlaceholder: Enter the AI prompt that will be pasted into Claude chat...

environment.binaryPathDesc: Configure which {agent} binary to use. Auto-detection finds all installed versions and recommends the best one.
environment.binaryNote: Note: Agent binary configurations are stored globally and apply to all projects.
environment.modelReasoningDesc: Set default parameters for {agent} launches. Leave blank to use the agent's built-in defaults.
environment.preferencesNote: Preferences apply when launching new processes for this agent. Existing CLI arguments still run afterwards.
environment.cliArgsDesc: Add custom command-line arguments that will be appended to the {agent} command.
environment.envVarsDesc: Configure environment variables for {agent} agent. These variables will be available when starting agents with this agent type.
environment.envVarsTerminalDesc: Configure environment variables for Terminal sessions. These variables will be available in the terminal shell.
environment.terminalOnlyModeDesc: Terminal mode opens a session with your default system shell. No binary configuration or CLI arguments are needed.

github.title: GitHub Integration
github.cliNotInstalledDesc: Install the GitHub CLI (brew install gh) to enable pull request automation.
github.authRequiredDesc: Run gh auth login in your terminal, then click Authenticate or Refresh to sync Schaltwerk.
github.openProject: Open a project to finish setup
github.openProjectDesc: Open a Schaltwerk project so GitHub integration can connect it to the right repository.
github.connectedDesc: Default branch {branch}. Reviewed sessions will target this repository.
github.readyToConnectDesc: Connect this project so reviewed sessions push to the correct GitHub repository.

mcp.title: MCP Server Configuration
mcp.nodeRequiredDesc: Node.js is required to run the Schaltwerk MCP server.
mcp.installNodeDesc: Install Node.js and restart {agent} to enable MCP tools.
mcp.claudeDesc: Allow {agent} to control Schaltwerk sessions in this project via MCP.
mcp.codexDesc: Enable {agent} to control Schaltwerk sessions via a global MCP entry in ~/.codex/config.toml. The server is project-aware and routes by your current repo.
mcp.opencodeDesc: Enable {agent} to control Schaltwerk sessions via MCP configuration. The server is project-aware and routes by your current repo.
mcp.ampDesc: Enable {agent} to control Schaltwerk sessions via a global MCP entry in ~/.config/amp/settings.json. The server is project-aware and routes by your current repo.
mcp.droidDesc: Enable {agent} to control Schaltwerk sessions via a global MCP entry in ~/.factory/mcp.json. The server is project-aware and routes by your current repo.
mcp.enableMcpHint: Enable MCP configuration to allow {agent} to manage sessions in this project.

nextStepsItems.restart: Restart {agent} to load the MCP server
nextStepsItems.resetButton: Or click the reset button (shown above) in the orchestrator terminal
nextStepsItems.available: The MCP server will then be available for all {agent} sessions in this project

mcp.codexConfigNote: This config is global. Codex will load it on next start.
mcp.opencodeConfigNote: This config can be project-specific (opencode.json) or global (~/.opencode/config.json).
mcp.ampConfigNote: This config is global in ~/.config/amp/settings.json. Amp will load it on next start.
mcp.droidConfigNote: This config is global in ~/.factory/mcp.json. Droid will load it on next start.
mcp.claudeConfigNote: Tip: Scroll horizontally to see the full command

newProject.title: New Project
newProject.createInfo: This will create a new folder and initialize a Git repository.

cloneProject.title: Clone Git Repository
cloneProject.subtitle: Clone a remote repository into a new Schaltwerk project
cloneProject.sshDetected: SSH remote detected. Ensure your ssh-agent is running with the appropriate key loaded.
cloneProject.httpsDetected: HTTPS remote detected. Credentials will be requested through your Git credential helper.
cloneProject.invalidUrl: Enter a valid SSH or HTTPS Git URL.
cloneProject.selectValidRemote: Select a valid remote and parent directory
cloneProject.folderNameNote: The folder name is derived from the repository name. You can rename it later if needed.

webPreview.invalidUrl: Enter a valid http(s) URL, hostname, or port.
webPreview.selectElementTitle: Select an element to paste its HTML into the terminal
webPreview.pausedDialog: Preview paused while dialog is openâ€¦
webPreview.browserHint: Enter a URL above to load your preview.

promoteVersion.title: Promote "{session}" as best version?
promoteVersion.deleteOthers: This will permanently delete the following sessions:
promoteVersion.remainRunning: The selected session will remain in Running state for continued work.

permissionPrompt.title: Folder Access Required
permissionPrompt.description: Schaltwerk needs access to the following folder to manage development sessions and run AI agents:
permissionPrompt.clickOk: Please click 'OK' in the system permission dialog that appeared.
permissionPrompt.restartHint: If you granted permission, you may need to restart the agent for it to take effect.
permissionPrompt.troubleDesc: Enable Documents access for {app} in System Settings > Privacy & Security > Files and Folders, then return here and click Try Again.
permissionPrompt.persistHint: If issues persist, try restarting Schaltwerk after granting permission.

installGuidance.appBundle: Look for "Schaltwerk" in Files and Folders and enable Documents access.
installGuidance.homebrew: Look for the Schaltwerk entry added by Homebrew under Files and Folders.
installGuidance.justfile: macOS lists the development binary path below - enable Documents access for that entry.
installGuidance.standalone: If System Settings shows a direct binary path, enable Documents access for that entry.
installGuidance.other: Enable Documents access for the matching entry shown in Files and Folders.

supportMessages.settingsOpened: System Settings opened. Enable Documents access, then return here and click Try Again.
supportMessages.permissionsReset: Folder permissions were reset. macOS will prompt for access again the next time you try.

agentBinaryStatus.clickToSetDefault: Click on an agent to set it as your default. This is the agent that will start in the orchestrator.

diffFileList.allPushed: All changes have been pushed to remote
diffFileList.atBaseCommit: You are at the base commit
diffFileList.upToDateWith: Your session is up to date with {branch}
diffFileList.selectSessionHint: Select a session to view changes

errors.failedToResetActionButtons: Failed to reset action buttons to defaults

newSessionModal.createAsSpec: Create as spec (no agent will start)
newSessionModal.newRepositoryHint: This repository has no commits yet. An initial commit will be created automatically when you start the agent.
newSessionModal.terminalOnlyHint: No AI agent will be started. A terminal will open with your default shell for custom development or running custom agents manually. The initial prompt above will not be pasted.
newSessionModal.specSaveHint: Specs are saved for later. You can start them when ready. Type @ to reference project files.
newSessionModal.issueSelectHint: Select an issue to pull its description and comments into the agent prompt.
newSessionModal.prSelectHint: Select a pull request to pull its description and comments into the agent prompt. The session will start on the PR branch.
newSessionModal.describeAgent: Describe the agent for the Claude session

validation.nameTooLong: Agent name must be 100 characters or less
validation.nameInvalidChars: Agent name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, and spaces
validation.selectIssue: Select a GitHub issue to continue
validation.selectPr: Select a GitHub pull request to continue
validation.selectAgent: Select at least one agent to continue

tooltips.selectIssuePrompt: Select a GitHub issue to generate a prompt
tooltips.selectPrPrompt: Select a GitHub pull request to generate a prompt
tooltips.selectAgentPrompt: Select at least one agent to continue
tooltips.agentNotInstalled: {agent} is not installed. Please install it to use this agent.
tooltips.agentsNotInstalled: One or more selected agents are not installed. Please install them to continue.
tooltips.useIssuePrompt: Use a GitHub issue as the agent prompt
tooltips.connectGithubIssue: Connect GitHub to enable GitHub issue prompts
tooltips.usePrPrompt: Use a GitHub pull request as the agent prompt
tooltips.connectGithubPr: Connect GitHub to enable GitHub PR prompts

errorBoundary.title: Well, that's unexpected
errorBoundary.description: Don't worry - this happens sometimes. Let's get things back on track.

globalKeepAwake.clickToEnable: Keep machine awake while agents work â€” click to enable
globalKeepAwake.autoPaused: Auto-paused (all sessions idle) â€” click to disable
globalKeepAwake.preventingSleep: Preventing sleep (sessions active) â€” click to disable
globalKeepAwake.willStayAwake: Machine will stay awake while sessions are active

customAgentModal.title: Add Custom Agent Tab
customAgentModal.helperText: Choose an AI agent to open in a new tab

switchAgentModal.warningOrchestrator: Switching the orchestrator agent will restart the terminal and clear the current session history. Any unsaved work in the orchestrator terminal will be lost.
switchAgentModal.warningSession: Switching the session agent will restart the terminal and clear the current session history. Any unsaved work in that terminal will be lost.
switchAgentModal.helperOrchestrator: Choose the AI agent to use for the orchestrator terminal
switchAgentModal.helperSession: Choose the AI agent to use for this session terminal

mergeSessionModal.title: Merge Session
mergeSessionModal.autoCancelStatus: Auto-cancel after a successful merge is currently {status}. This preference is stored per project and can also be adjusted in Settings â†’ Project.
mergeSessionModal.autoCancelHint: This preference is stored per project and can also be adjusted in Settings â†’ Project.
mergeSessionModal.squashDesc: Create a single commit with your message, then fast-forward the parent branch.
mergeSessionModal.reapplyDesc: Replay all session commits onto the latest parent branch, preserving history.
mergeSessionModal.commitPlaceholder: Describe the changes that landed in this session
mergeSessionModal.nothingToMergeBody: {sessionBranch} has no commits to merge into {parentBranch}.

tooltips.isUpToDate: Session has no commits to merge into the parent branch.
tooltips.needsCommitMessage: Enter a commit message to enable merge.
